name: Ilha Sertaneja

address.street: Rua Dr. Nylo Dornellas Câmara, 16 Pracinha de Boa Viagem
address.full: Rua Dr. Nylo Dornellas Câmara, 16 Pracinha de Boa Viagem, Recife, Pernambuco 51021-080

description: Ilha Sertaneja has brought the northeastern backlands down to the capital city, with traditional dishes that include the best sun-dried beef in town and a delicious goat , all with excellent service and pleasant surroundings.
